title: Anyone looking for mid laner main
body:
If anyone is looking for a main mid laner for team, just tell me. 
Favourite champs in no order: {{champion:84}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:61}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:115}}

replies.body: we arent that high either and we are looking for a mid laner for our team, since our current one is unable to play right now, if interested add me in game

im stuck in bronze because of %%%%ty teams
but i am actually a good mid laner
If you are as good as you say you are you would be out of Bronze in no time, bad teams or not.

you have no idea how bad these teams are though
It's stupid
Sorry The team im recruiting for is after high plats and up{{item:3070}}
No one is stuck in an Elo because of bad teams.
